column1: Which region are you representing ? (Oshana and Ohangwena are preferable)
column2: Please select your age range (Nyola emvula dhoye)
column3: Please select you sex (Nyola ongundu yoye)
column4: Please select your level of education(Primary School, High School, College, University). (Nyola ongunduskola yoye)
column5: 1. What are the possible threats to our society in Namibia? (Oshike aashi etele aantu)
column6: 2. What does climate change mean to you? Tick all that apply? (Ombepo otayi ku )
column7: 3. In which of the environmental factors below have you noticed particular change in over the past 5 years. (Oshike wamona shalunduluka memvula 5)
column8: 3.1  In which of the environmental factors below have you noticed particular change in over the past 10 years. (Oshike wamona shalunduluka memvula 10)
column9: 4. What do you think are the effects of climate change? Tick all that apply  (Owamano shike)
column10: 5. How likely are you to participate in climate change related activities?
column11: 6. Do you think that you are well informed about different issues related to climate change? (Oholandula omkalo lyombepo)
column12: 7. To the best of your knowledge, how many  climate change awareness campaigns have been carried out in rural communities?
column13: 8. How is climate change information disseminated in rural areas?
column14: 9. What are the types of losses caused by climate change in your region?
column15: 10. Of the ten environmental issues listed below, please choose ONLY three you believe should be the top priorities of the country. (Nyolo ashike 3 ___ dhiwuwete dhapumbwa oshikwatho)
column16: 11. How much do you think climate change exacerbates/worsens water security?
column17: 12. What other factors do you think worsens water security ?
column18: 13. Has climate change affected your crop yield?(Otwii pula omkalo lyombepo oyalundulula iikunomwa yoye?)
column19: 13.1. If yes, at what rate has climate change affected your crop yield low, medium or high? (Omkalo lyombepo oya lundulula iikunomwa yoye uunene nenke uushona?)
column20: 14. If yes, at what rate has climate change affected your crop yield low, medium or high? (Omkalo lyombepo oya lundulula iikunomwa yoye uunene nenke uushona?)
column21: 14. How severe are droughts getting in the last 5 years?
column22: 15. Are you aware of measures that can be taken to mitigate the negative effects of climate change?
column23: 15.1. If yes, please mention 2:
column25: Who Referred you to this survey ? Please include their Name and Phone Number / E-mail or Instagram handle.
